embeds.title: Guide to Wheel of Fortune
embeds.description: Wheel of Fortune <:eventwheel:1039004325214691388> is a __7-day__ event where a player can participate to get hero shards.

fields.name: Rules
value<text>: • Players can play up to __200__ spins each day
• The first spin is always free.
• On day 2~7 of the event, the first spin costs 60 gems **if** you do not have any unused Raffle Ticket <:aowraffle:1039016638248386581>.
• On day 7, any unused Raffle Ticket carry over to the next Wheel of Fortune.

fields.name: Best strategy
value<text>: • Distribute your spins and make sure you use all Raffle Tickets <:aowraffle:1039016638248386581> each day so you can take advantage of discount the next day.
• Statistically, doing 200 spins is the most economic. You will need about 19 160 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>.
